DOC.detailed_description: 108 patient randomized receive induction chemotherapy ( IC , Arm A ) IC ( Arm B ) definitive chemoradiotherapy patient inoperable thoracic esophageal squamous cell carcinoma . Patients assign Arm B first receive two cycle 3-weekly schedule IC , consist docetaxel 75 mg/m2 day 1 cisplatin 75 mg/m2 day 1 . The prescribed dose radiotherapy generally 50-60 Gy/25-28fr . The concomitant chemotherapy docetaxel 20 mg/m2 day 1 , cisplatin 25 mg/m2 day 1 , repeat weekly radiation .
